description: Visitors receive a box worth of pantry staples. Occasionally other items such as meat and vegetables are available. Families can come weekly as needed. Call or text the food pantry manager to set up an appointment or arrange for delivery if needed.
eligibility_requirements: Open to all

description: All FRESHFARM markets accept SNAP/EBT, WIC and Senior FMNP checks. FRESH Match provides a dollar-for-dollar match on all federal benefits spent at market.
eligibility_requirements: Farmer's markets are open to all to shop. FRESH match is only available for those using SNAP, P-EBT and Senior Farmer's Market Nutrition Program.

frequency: Weekly. Participants can come once a month
description: Regular offerings include cereal, rice, beans, canned vegetables, pasta. Occasionally also have protein, eggs, and fresh produce. Registered clients can come once per month. Also provides diapers.
eligibility_requirements: Bring photo ID on first visit, and fill out an application. Must live in Virginia. To receive diapers, bring an identification for the child (birth certificate, social security card, insurance card, etc.)
